      • schedule

        public static void schedule(AdvanceCmsnPayment advanceCmsnPayment)
        Checks the user's authority limit and creates an approvable activity if necessary before calling makePayment(). If the user is the unrestricted user, makePayment() is called without performing a check for authority limit.

      • schedule

        public static void schedule(BonusCmsnPayment bonusCmsnPayment)
        Checks the user's authority limit and creates an approvable activity if necessary before calling makePayment(). If the user is the unrestricted user, makePayment() is called without performing a check for authority limit.

      • writeOffCommission

        public static java.util.List<ChargeCommissionWriteoff> writeOffCommission(ChargeCommission[] chargeCommissions)

      • getNonEmptyCyclesAsList

        public static java.util.List<AgencyBillCycle> getNonEmptyCyclesAsList(Producer producer)
        1) a statement owns at least one invoice item, that cycle will be returned 2) a billed statement owns snapshot invoice items, that cycle will be returned 3) a planned statement, with the previous statement billed inherits past due/billed snapshots from the previous billed statement, that cycle will be returned.

        This is not the best method to use performance-wise, but it is necessary for the UI, since we cannot use filters on Union queries. Therefore this method should only be used when we really need a list and a union query will not suffice.

        Parameters:
        producer - to get the cycles from
        Returns:
        a list of all of the cycles that contain statements with invoice items or with snapshot invoice items. Also always include the cycle corresponding to the first on sequence planned invoice even if it is empty.
